Reviews.Title: lg rumor 2
Reviews.Author: fourteen year-old girl lol
Reviews.Content: The lg rumor 2 appears to be a good phone i've held it in stores and it feels very solid. The qwerty keypad is okay. kajeets coverage is through sprint. the nagatives is its way too expensive and no touch screen. All in all kajeet needs more qwerty keypad phones, and this is the best qwerty phone that kajeet has. Also kajeet is only 15.00 for unlimited texting

ProductInfo.Features:
Kid-friendly slider phone in black for use with Kajeet, the cell phone service made 4 kids
Pay for just the minutes you use or choose monthly talk/text plans; optional GPS locator service
Handsfree communication via speakerphone and Bluetooth, voice dialing capabilities, personal organizer tools
Up to 3.5 hours of talk time, up to 170 hours (7.1 days) of standby time
Daily Access Charge applies only to pay as you go plans
ProductInfo.Name: LG Rumor2 Prepaid Phone, Black (Kajeet)
